name: Living together!
description:
We enjoy being at home together!
However that does not always mean we are having a fun time. Everyday life has to be managed: Doing laundry, sorting papers, cooking, watering the plants etc. A home can only work if both partners team up and help each other out. The game represents exactly that: You live together in a flat and have to do chores in order to have some freetime later. Different chores will pile up and you only have several ingame hours to do them!

Art & Dev by DUI
